milestoneDescription: A team of food lovers and tech enthusiasts envision a platform for sharing home-cooked recipes worldwide.
Our website launches, welcoming 10,000+ users to share family recipes and cooking tips.
We introduce recipe ratings and comments, fostering community interaction and feedback.
Our mobile app debuts on iOS and Android, gaining 50,000+ users within six months.
New features include a custom recipe feed, 'like' options, and personal cookbooks.
We add video recipes and partner with renowned chefs, expanding our audience.
We celebrate a major milestone: over 1 million unique recipes shared by our global community.
